About me

The executive summary

I am an award-winning researcher in robotics (Most Outstanding Student Paper at the 2019 IEEE 2nd International Conference on Soft Robotics). I am experienced in fluidic and mechanical systems, electronics, rapid prototyping, robotics, spectroscopy, and systems engineering. A technical graduate with degrees in Physics and Electronic Engineering.
